body.p: Print errors in formulas are represented by the <choice> element. The formula is always completely in the <sic> element (erroneous original) respectively in the <corr> element (corrected transcription).
body.codeblock: <choice> <sic><formula notation="[notation]">[incorrect formula according to the original]</formula></sic> <corr><formula notation="[notation]">[corrected transcription of the formula]</formula></corr> </choice>

p.i: Source: Siemens, Werner von: Gesammelte Abhandlungen und Vortr√§ge. Berlin, 1881. [Facsimile 208]
